text: Kyrgyzstan competed at the 2002 Winter Olympics in Salt Lake City, United States. Biathlete Aleksandr Tropnikov and ski jumper Dmitry Chvykov were the only competitors for the country at these Olympics. ==Biathlon== ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Event !Athlete !Misses 1 !Time !Rank |- |10 km sprint |Aleksandr Tropnikov |align="center"|2 |align="center"|29:30.2 |align="center"|77 |} {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !Event !Athlete !Time !Misses !Adjusted time 3 !Rank |- |20 km |Aleksandr Tropnikov |align="center"|58:05.3 |align="center"|2 |align="center"|1'00:05.3 |align="center"|73 |} : 1 A penalty loop of 150 metres had to be skied per missed target. : 3 One minute added per missed target. == Ski jumping == {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="3"|Qualifying jump !colspan="3"|Final jump 1 !colspan="2"|Final jump 2 !colspan="2"|Total |- !Distance !Points !Rank !Distance !Points !Rank !Distance !Points !Points !Rank |- |Dmitry Chvykov |Normal hill |align="center"|86.5 |align="center"|104.0 |align="center"|27 Q |align="center"|85.0 |align="center"|101.5 |align="center"|41 |colspan="4"|Did not advance |- |Dmitry Chvykov |Large hill |align="center"|107.5 |align="center"|88.5 |align="center"|30 Q |align="center"|113.0 |align="center"|98.4 |align="center"|39 |colspan="4"|Did not advance |} ==References== *Official Olympic Reports *sports-reference Category:Nations at the 2002 Winter Olympics 2002 Category:2002 in Kyrgyzstani sport
title: Kyrgyzstan at the 2002 Winter Olympics
